boardgame.name: The Russian Campaign
莫斯科攻防戰
boardgame.description: On the 18th of December, 1940 Hitler issued Fuhrer Directive No. 21, code named Barbarossa, which stated: _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ldquo;The Soviet Union is to be crushed in one swift campaign before the war with England ends._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rdquo;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;On the 22nd of June, 1941, Barbarossa was finally launched. Over three million German soldiers, most of them veterans of the campaigns in Poland, France, and the Balkans, began a blitzkrieg style of invasion against two million Russian defenders. The initial advance was fantastic. Hundreds of thousands of prisoners were taken and the motorized divisions began to outrun the rest of the army. The Germans reached the gates of Moscow, victor in sight. Then the winter came._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;RUSSIAN CAMPAIGN has been universally acclaimed as one of the finest wargames around. With the ease and playability of the 'Classics', the game also conveys the feel of the actual campaign and is exceptionally accurate historically. Both players will have to use the subtle skills, advantages, and tactics of their historical counterparts to win._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Game features include rail movement, sea movement, invasions, stukas, partisans, automatic victory, SS units, sudden death victory conditions, and double impulse movement capabilities. Seven scenarios break the total campaign down into its most important battles._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;A 22_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; x 28_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; mapboard, various playing aids and charts, and a twelve-page rulebook. On every gamer's top ten list, this one belongs in every gamer's library._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;AVALON HILL COMPLEXITY RATING: 4_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;(On a scale of 1-easy; 10-hard)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Playing Time_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash;Six Hours or Less_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The inspiration to Russia Besieged._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The fourth (and fifth) editions of this game have a different game entry, as does the Designer Signature edition. _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;a target='_blank' href=_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;https://boardgamegeek.com/boardgame/10156/russian-campaign-fourth-edition_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; rel=_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;nofollow_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;https://boardgamegeek.com/boardgame/10156/russian-campaign-f..._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;/a_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;a target='_blank' href=_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;https://boardgamegeek.com/boardgame/208974/russian-campaign-designer-signature-edition_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; rel=_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;nofollow_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;https://boardgamegeek.com/boardgame/208974/russian-campaign-..._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;/a_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: Box lid shows light-to-moderate signs of wear, with one split corner. Box bottom shows light wear, with no split corners. Board is intact, with 2 very light stains, one in each of 2 corners of the board. The board shows no warping. Counters: there is one German counter missing. All others are present. Manual is in decent shape, no rips, stains or writing. OOB charts are in excellent shape. A photocopy of the Russian Campaign PBM kit is included.
PayPal or deposit on my bank account.
Played once. Nothing_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s missing or damaged.
In reasonable condition a couple of 100% correct a couple of counters are replacements
Big flat box. Punched, complete and gently played. Box has minor scuffs on corners.
Unpunched. The box and game are in mint condition.

for sale: The Russian Campaign. AH_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s big box game, that_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s sat on my shelf unplayed for years. All pieces are there (I matched each piece to their OOB chart location and have verified all counters are there as of 7/3/06) as are the charts, maps, papers, etc. The counters are punched but for that_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s all this game has seen from me. Looking for a good home.

3rd edition, unpunched and complete. Contents are in like new condition. Box top has a good amount of wear and denting with a couple of split corners, but is otherwise solid. Buyer pays actual shipping costs from 98118 via USPS Parcel Post or Priority Mail (your pick). Should weight about 3-4 lbs.

3rd Edition. Unpunched, not in shrink. Very slight scuffs on box lid. Buyer pays shipping + $1.00 handling. Shipped when payment received or, if personal check, when check clears. Pictures provided upon request.
All contents in very good condition. Additional boards and complete counter sets are available.
Punched, played. Map, rulebook, players aids are in like new condition. Box has a rip in the cover. Base shipping is for continental US only. I will provide overseas shipping and handling later.
AH Version. Punched. Counters have a number written in pen on the back.
Box damaged Overall condition acceptable I have NOT counted the playing pieces, so some may be missing
2nd edition. Unpunched. Box is fair. Rules are good (no markings, but show wear from being read many times)
Minor shelf wear. Tear in one end of box. other components in good condition.

UNPUNCHED! Chits UNPUNCHED and boards never used. The box shows shelf and storage wear and has been opened. See picture! If picture is not present, please email us on BGG. Domestic Shipping: USPS MEDIA MAIL with Delivery Confirmation = $5.99 or USPS PRIORITY MAIL with Delivery Confirmation = $12.99
Game is still in shrinkwrap. Brand new condition just like from the store shelf. Please ask for shipping costs before you buy.
Box slightly dished, maps great condition, about half the counters punched.
Reserved for user lbathayde.
Please add $10 for shipping. Pay by check or money order.
Game is punched and complete. Map and paperwork clean but a little dull from age. No writing or tape marks. Box is good but has some split corners. Accept PayPal only outside US.
The counters are punched and clipped, with one rail counter missing. Except for a little fraying on one of the box corners, everything is in very good condition.

2nd Edition Rules - note that the ONLY change I am aware of in the 3rd edition rules was to add _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Attacker doesn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t retreat_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; to the Terrain Effects Chart for woods. No changes to the counters, mapboard or OB charts. CONDITION: Very Good condition overall, contents near mint, unused and complete, with UNPUNCHED counters. The board still has tissue paper between the leaves! The box has light shelfwear and creasing with one split corner. POSTAGE COST: UK postage: £5.50 European Postage: £9.00 Rest of World Postage: £17.500 Any buyers in and around London are welcome to collect in person (cash on collection). COMBINED SHIPPING: I will always combine multiple items to reduce your shipping costs where possible. Please note that it is NOT always cheaper to combine shipping on games outside the UK due to the weight limit of 2KG on the Small Packet service. As a rough approximation, outside the UK it is usually cheaper to combine 5 or more games, while 4 or less are best sent individually. This depends entirely on the specific games - please contact me before buying if you wish to purchase multiple games so that I can give you an accurate shipping cost. ABOUT ME: I have been playing and collecting games for over 25 years and I also sell games and magazines on ebay with the same username (saabdastard) where I have a 100% positive rating and a feedback score of over 4000. I am a verified PAYPAL Premier account holder (since 2004), with over 650 PayPal Verified Buyers. SELLERS TERMS AND CONDITIONS: PAYMENT TERMS: Please wait until you receive my invoice before sending payment. Payment is due within 5 days of the date you receive my invoice. Please do not purchase if you do not intend to pay, or cannot pay within this time frame. PAYMENT METHODS: UK buyers may use PayPal, cheque or cash-on-collection. Overseas buyers MUST USE PAYPAL only. SHIPPING: Buyer is responsible for all shipping costs. Europe and Rest of World rates shown above are for Airmail. Surface Mail rate to Rest of World is available if you wish (same as Europe Air rate), but Surface Mail to Rest of World can take up to 2 months! There is no real difference between Air and Surface rates for Europe. INSURANCE: Insurance is optional on all items, unless noted. Failure to take out optional insurance limits my liability for loss or damage in the mail to the amount automatically covered by Royal Mail (currently £39 per package for Small Packets, £150 for International Standard). CUSTOMS: Buyers outside the EU are responsible for all Customs charges applicable to their country. RETURNS: New Unopened items may be returned for a refund of the purchase price of the item, excluding shipping charges, within 7 days of the delivery date. All returned items must be in the original packaging and in the condition that they were shipped to you. Defective or damaged items can be returned for an exchange or refund within 7 days of the delivery date. All returns require authorization from me BEFORE returning the item.

Avalon Hill_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s The Russian Campaign Variant X from The General Vol. 18 No. 5 Includes: The rule booklet, OOB_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s , mounted _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; die cut Counters . Do you feel that a simulation should only give one a starting point? That rules should not restrict _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;because it was not done_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;, but only because it was not possible? Do you hunger for German paratroops or Russian dive-bombers? Then here is another _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;what if_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; RUSSIAN CAMPAIGN variant for you. This variant is the final result of a labor of love. Special effort was made to achieve as much consistency as possible. In other words, the rules should apply the same to both sides. Now add new life with this variant to your Avalon Hill game! These full color counter sheets are mounted and die cut!
3rd Edition from 1977. Game is in excellent condition and has been verified as complete! Box is in good condition.
Punched, complete. Box has one busted corner.
Game is complete. Components are in very good condition. Box has some shelf wear.

Box top has a tear in one end and there are a couple of places where tape has torn off the printing. Otherwise the box seems to be in reasonable condition for a 30 year old game. The counters appear to be all there; but I didn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t count them. Just being honest.

Avalon Hill 3_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;rd edition. Game is unpunched, complete and in excellent condition. Game box is in excellent condition. Can send photo.
Complete. Punched, but in nice shape. Very little wear on box, components seems hardly played. Image below is actual copy for sale. Thanks!

Contents complete and in very good condition. Counters punched and clipped neatly with a C4. Box has minor shelf wear. No split corners. A nice copy. $10 USPS Priority Shipping to the US. Paypal preferred. Money order accepted. Paypal ID: briancgannon@att.net
Punched, complete. The box lid has two split corners and light wear but is otherwise in very good condition.

This is the second edition. One piece is missing (with a homemade substitute) -- see below. Box top is substantially concave and has an outward bow. One corner had split but was (neatly) glued back together. There are a few ripples in the paper on the box top. Box top shows substantial wear along the edges. Box bottom also shows wear. The rulebook shows wear and dirt from use, and is missing one of its staples. The OB charts show wear and dirt. The mapboards are in good condition, with light wear and light dirt. The counters are in acceptable condition, with substantial wear and light dirt. One piece -- the German 44th 5-4 infantry -- is missing. I made an (amateurish) replacement. All the other pieces are present. There are multiple properly colored blank counters if you would like to make a better replacement for the missing infantry unit.

Components including mounted game boards, counters, charts, and rulebook are in excellent condition. Box has some shelf wear. Top box has three repaired with tape corners. I store my games in a pet-free and smoke-free environment and I package my games for shipment with the utmost care. I ship quickly - within 24 hours of receiving payment. Shipping weight is 5 pounds.
Very good edition and complete.
Complete 2nd edition. Includes an extra _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;home-made_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; German 5-4 infantry piece.

COMBINED SHIPPING: I will always combine multiple items to reduce your shipping costs where possible. Please note that it is NOT always cheaper to combine shipping on games outside the UK due to the weight limit of 2KG on the Small Packet service. As a rough approximation, outside the UK it is usually cheaper to combine 5 or more games, while 4 or less are best sent individually. This depends entirely on the specific games - please contact me before buying if you wish to purchase multiple games so that I can give you an accurate shipping cost. ABOUT ME: I have been playing and collecting games for over 25 years and I also sell games and magazines on ebay with the same username (saabdastard) where I have a 100% positive rating and a feedback score of over 4000. I am a verified PAYPAL Premier account holder (since 2004), with over 650 PayPal Verified Buyers. SELLERS TERMS AND CONDITIONS: PAYMENT TERMS: Please wait until you receive my invoice before sending payment. Payment is due within 5 days of the date you receive my invoice. Please do not purchase if you do not intend to pay, or cannot pay within this time frame. PAYMENT METHODS: UK buyers may use PayPal, cheque or cash-on-collection. Overseas buyers MUST USE PAYPAL only. SHIPPING: Buyer is responsible for all shipping costs. Europe and Rest of World rates shown above are for Airmail. Surface Mail rate to Rest of World is available if you wish (same as Europe Air rate), but Surface Mail to Rest of World can take up to 2 months! There is no real difference between Air and Surface rates for Europe. INSURANCE: Insurance is optional on all items, unless noted. Failure to take out optional insurance limits my liability for loss or damage in the mail to the amount automatically covered by Royal Mail (currently £39 per package for Small Packets, £150 for International Standard). CUSTOMS: Buyers outside the EU are responsible for all Customs charges applicable to their country. RETURNS: New Unopened items may be returned for a refund of the purchase price of the item, excluding shipping charges, within 7 days of the delivery date. All returned items must be in the original packaging and in the condition that they were shipped to you. Defective or damaged items can be returned for an exchange or refund within 7 days of the delivery date. All returns require authorization from me BEFORE returning the item.

Avalon Hill The Russian Campaign Replacement _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Variant Counters One new complete set of Avalon Hill The Russian Campaign board game counters. The counters have been redone in vibrant colours with larger graphics. National markings have been added to the counters to aid in identification. Included with the set are variant counters for the ... But What If variant plus Variant X as well as some extra historically accurate units included. Order of Battle cards included will indicate when they are to be used. These are new style counters, printed on cardboard, laminated with a protective plastic covering and hand cut. They are the same thickness as the original counters. Caution: Not a complete game. Must be used with Avalon Hill_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s The Russian Campaign game for complete enjoyment. Shipping will be $6.00 to Canada, $7.00 to the United States or $11.00 internationally, by air mail small packet. Expedited tracked and insured is also available. I will attempt to combine shipping on multiple orders whenever possible.
